title: Pelosi Announces Impeachment Inquiry
itunes:title: Pelosi Announces Impeachment Inquiry
description:
Kevin spoke with Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media, and Jack Kingston, Former Georgia Congressman and Trump 2020 campaign surrogate. They discussed Speaker Nancy Pelosi's announcement that the House will open a formal impeachment inquiry into President Trump.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
